org.purewidgets.client.im.json
Class WidgetInputJson

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
      org.purewidgets.client.json.GenericJson
          org.purewidgets.client.im.json.WidgetInputJson

public class WidgetInputJson
extends GenericJson

WidgetInputJson is a Json DTO for receiving and sending widget input information to the interaction manager server.

Author:
"Jorge C. S. Cardoso"
See Also:
WidgetInput
